scene.description: Ultra-photorealistic candid golden hour photo in a cozy gaming bedroom. A young woman is sitting at her computer desk playing with a PS5 controller, both bare feet casually propped up and crossed on the desk. Natural golden hour sunlight. Amateur iPhone snapshot feel.

elements: computer desk with monitor (screen off or dark)
window letting in warm golden sunlight
minimal background – bed or posters visible
environment.lighting: pure natural golden hour sunlight from side/back – rich warm glow, soft rim light on hair, legs and skin, long natural shadows

photography.camera_style: amateur iPhone photo taken by someone else – candid, slight handheld camera shake, minor motion blur on hair strands and controller hand, slightly crooked framing, imperfect composition, casual snapshot vibe
photography.angle: side/three-quarter view, slightly low to capture crossed bare feet clearly
photography.shot_type: very candid relaxed golden hour gaming moment – feels quickly snapped
photography.texture: hyper-realistic skin with golden hour warmth, fabric details, hair highlights, natural imperfections, light film grain

appearance.build: slim yet curvy with soft feminine proportions
appearance.skin: fair skin with warm golden-hour glow
appearance.face: soft facial structure, full lips, delicate nose, naturally defined cheekbones
appearance.hair: platinum blonde or very light blonde hair, messy low ponytail or loose bun, face-framing strands, relaxed bedhead texture

pose.overall: sitting relaxed in gaming chair at desk, both legs extended with bare feet propped up on the edge of the desk, ankles comfortably crossed
pose.legs: both feet up on desk, ankles crossed, toes relaxed and clearly visible
pose.feet: barefoot, perfectly pedicured with glossy black nail polish on toes, well-groomed and prominent in frame
pose.arms: both hands holding black PS5 DualSense controller in lap, playing actively
pose.torso: relaxed lean back, midriff fully exposed

clothing.top: white ribbed cropped tank top with thick athletic straps and high neckline

requirements: Both bare feet must be visible and propped up on the desk with ankles crossed
Feet positioned closer to camera than face
Glossy black pedicure on toes clearly visible
Pastel pink over-ear headphones worn on head
